ModMetaData.name: Beam me up Scotty (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Gouda quiche
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Gouda quiches mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1507132557
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr][td][url=https://dsc.gg/mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/BeamMeUpScotty][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/Be8E2qJ.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/9Bu9Lem.png[/img]
[img]https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/ftl/images/4/42/CrewTeleporterCircle.png/revision/latest?cb=20150924212252[/img] Travel through space at light speed.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/CVlgJM7.png[/img] [list] [*][b]Teleport workstation[/b]: at least one is needed. It will give orders to tp spots. [*][b]Mini station[/b]: smaller workstation, with smaller capacities. [*][b]Teleport spot[/b]: build it close to the workstation and choose the way it works. It is also a storage, meaning you can prioritize what pawns will put on it. You can choose to automate teleportation and the way it goes : in, out, swap. [*][b]Teleport catcher[/b]: cheap wooden building that you can link to a teleport spot. It is a storage. A pawn or any object standing on it will be teleported. [*][b]Teleport bed[/b]: cheap building that allows to teleport wounded, incapacitated or captured pawns. [*][b]Teleport box[/b]: did you think we would leave the cat behind? [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/dhRaYyd.png[/img] [list] [*] Build a workstation (power required) [*] Build a spot in workstation range (power required) [*] Build a catcher [*] Link the spot to the catcher with a colonist [*] Select the spot, choose the way it teleports. [*] Select workstation to start it up. You can browse different tp spots within range. [*] Alternatively, you can choose to teleport automatically, by setting it up on the teleport spot. [/list] [img]https://i.imgur.com/v1lhRUH.gif[/img]
[h1]Travel between maps :[/h1] [list] [*] Link the spots before you travel. [*] Uninstall the spot that does not require power. [*] Carry the spot in caravan. [*] Reinstall. [*] ??? [*] Profit. [/list] [img]https://i.imgur.com/yGSWYmb.gif[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/9kOXMXt.png[/img] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2203002421]Mantis B, the basilisk[/url] [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/F0Jvl6C.png[/img] [list] [*]Works with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1909914131]Save Our Ship 2[/url]. [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/mPn1G3B.png[/img] [list] [*]Bunkier, main artist [*]Lilairen, Literary priestess [/list]
[h1]More Faster Than Light in RimWorld[/h1] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1304432145]Clone bay[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2049822320]Mindcontrol[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1338611415]Crystal race[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2036348893]Engi race[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1543164737]Lanius race[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2025343753]Mantis race[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2027296393]Rockmen race[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2032477436]Zoltan race[/url] [/list]
[h1]Known bugs[/h1] [list] [*]The animal box is currently bugged. I already fixed it in my version, but I need to upload it and Publisher Plus is currently down for now. I will update it when publisher plus is fixed. [/list]
This is part of my [b]Faster Than Light[/b] for RimWorld collection : [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1305158955]Lighter Than Fast[/url].
[url=https://ko-fi.com/goudaquiche][img]https://i.imgur.com/R3wxkQW.png[/img][/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] or the standalone [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2873415404]Uploader[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [*] Use [url=https://github.com/RimSort/RimSort/releases/latest]RimSort[/url] to sort your mods [/list]
